TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientCredentials extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientCredentials extends System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityCredentialsManager implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior
Public Class ClientCredentials Inherits SecurityCredentialsManager Implements IEndpointBehavior
type ClientCredentials = class inherit SecurityCredentialsManager interface IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 使用户能够配置客户端和服务凭据以及服务凭据身份验证设置，以在通信的客户端上使用。

span.span: Enables the user to configure client and service credentials as well as service credential authentication settings for use on the client side of communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 类的 属性来访问 。The is accessed through the property of the class. 向 集合中添加了一个 对象。A object is added to the collection. 属性是该集合中某个条目之上的一种*外观*（已知的设计模式）。The property is a *Façade* (a well-known design pattern) over an entry in that collection. 此类中的许多属性可返回主要由属性组成的对象。Many properties in this class return objects that consist mainly of properties. 以下对象可用于配置：您 `get` 该对象后，可通过调用其成员来将其用于 `set` 属性。These objects can be used for configuration: once you `get` the object, you can use it to `set` properties by calling its members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写此类并实现你自己的包含自定义的安全令牌管理器的自定义客户端凭据。The following code sample shows how to override this class and implement your own custom client credentials that includes a custom security token manager. > [!IMPORTANT] > 需要特别注意的是，将重写 方法以创建自定义安全令牌管理器。It is important to note that the method is overridden to create a custom security token manager. 从 派生的安全令牌管理器。The security token manager, derived from . 必须返回派生自 的自定义安全令牌提供程序，才能创建实际的安全令牌。must return a custom security token provider, derived from , to create the actual security token. 如果不遵循此模式创建安全令牌，则您的应用程序将面临安全攻击风险，尤其是特权提升。If you do not follow this pattern for creating security tokens, your application will be at risk for security attacks, specifically elevation of privileges. 此编码模式确保在缓存通道工厂时使用正确的凭据。This coding pattern ensures that the correct credentials are used when channel factories are cached. [!code-csharp[c_CustomCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customcredentials/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_CustomCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customcredentials/vb/client/client.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用由此属性返回的对象配置凭据，方法是调用 属性。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the credential by calling the property. 同样，如果要使用的网络凭据与当前线程的标记不同，那么您可以指定要使用的网络凭据。Similarly, you can specify the network credential to use if it is different from the current thread's token. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此属性设置凭据用户名和密码。The following code shows how to use this property to set the credentials user name and password. summary.span: 使用此属性可指定在联系本地安全令牌服务时要使用的终结点地址和绑定。

span.span: Use this property to specify the endpoint address and binding to use when contacting your local Security Token Service.

summary.span: 某服务需要使用已颁发令牌的身份验证，但该服务的策略（表示为客户端上的绑定）未显式指定如何和在什么位置获取已颁发的令牌时，会使用此信息。

span.span: This information is used when a service requires authentication using an issued token, but the policy of the service (represented as a binding on the client) does not explicitly specify how and where to obtain the issued token.

value.span: 一个 ，指定用于从本地安全令牌服务获取令牌的参数。

span.span: An that specifies parameters to be used to obtain a token from a local Security Token Service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServiceCertificate As X509CertificateRecipientClientCredential

summary.span: 获取用于指定服务的 X.509 证书的对象。

span.span: Gets an object used to specify a service's X.509 certificate.

value.span: 一个 ，表示要用于某特定服务的证书。

span.span: An that represents the certificate to use for a particular service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性返回的对象配置证书的属性，方法是调用该证书的成员。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the certificate's properties by calling its members. 您可以指定一个默认证书和一个在与某特定 URI 进行通信时使用的其他证书。You can specify a single default certificate as well as a different certificate to be used when communicating with a particular URI. 通过此类，您还可以控制通过以消息级别执行的 SSL/TLS 协商的服务证书的身份验证设置。Through this class, you also control the authentication settings for service certificates negotiated through SSL/TLS negotiation performed at the message level. 不必始终指定此属性。This property does not always have to be specified. 是否需要此属性取决于身份验证模式和在用于与服务进行通信的绑定上设置的协商选项。Whether it is required depends on the authentication mode and negotiation options set on the binding that is used to communicate with the service. 控制此行为的一些相关类包括 和 。Some relevant classes that control this behavior are and . 你还可以使用客户端应用程序配置文件中的[<证书>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity)元素来设置此值。You can also set this value using the [<certificate>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 此代码演示如何使用此属性获取服务的证书以及如何设置其属性。This code shows how to use this property to get the service's certificate and set its properties. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性返回的对象配置 Windows 凭据，方法是调用该凭据的成员，如 和 。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the Windows credential by calling its members, such as and . 这些设置控制在消息或传输级别的 SPNEGO 协商期间使用的 Windows 凭据或用于消息级别的身份验证的 Kerberos 令牌的属性。These settings control the Windows credential used during SPNEGO negotiation at either the message or transport level or the properties of Kerberos tokens used for authentication at the message level. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此属性返回的对象配置模拟级别。The following code shows how to use the object returned by this property to configure the impersonation level. [!code-csharp[S_UEClientCredentials#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclientcredentials/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEClientCredentials#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclientcredentials/vb/program.vb#5)]
